snippet.title: Through the Thorns and Curses | Early Access Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Early gameplay for the game Through The Thorns and Curses.

Through the Thorns and Curses is a roguelike deckbuilder fused with a tabletop RPG. Take on the role of a wanderer who has entered a strange land under a mysterious curse. Build your deck, challenge yourself, and free the land from its curse. But beware, time is not on your side!

Wishlist on Steam!
